# (incomplete) User Guide

NOTE

See the previous "Getting Started" section to see how to start the program.

# Tasks to execute

The Web Dataset Maintanence (WDM) Tool allows you to carry out three key tasks required to keep the underlying database updated and generate datasets from the database.

TIP

See the "Database" section to learn more about the structure of the database that holds all the underlying records used to generate datasets.

# Update the "SimpleCount" table

Update the table.

# Update the "Population" table

Update the table.

# Generate a dataset/datasets

Generate a dataset
